login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account

logout.title: Sign Out
logout.confirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
logout.success: You have been signed out successfully

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Enter your details to create a new account
register.acceptTerms: I accept the terms and conditions

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.success: If an account exists with that email, you will receive a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.success: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.invalidToken: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.success: Your password has been changed successfully.

session.expiredMessage: Please sign in again to continue.
